src_original: yathā gṛhītaṃ sugatairbodhicittaṃ purātanaiḥ /  te bodhisattvaśikṣāyāmānupūrvyā yathā sthitāḥ // SBca_3.22 //
tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣiṣyāmi yathākramam // SBca_3.23 //
evaṃ gṛhītvā matimān bodhicittaṃ prasādataḥ /  punaḥ pṛṣṭasya puṣṭyarthaṃ cittamevaṃ praharṣayet // SBca_3.24 //
adya me saphalaṃ janma sulabdho mānuṣo bhavaḥ /
adya buddhakule jāto buddhaputro 'smi sāṃpratam // SBca_3.25 //
